jungle.prompt: a kid is walking through a lush jungle waterfall, pixar-style
jungle.text: Once, in a jungle so green it shimmered, a brave explorer named {child_name} discovered a secret waterfall.

jungle.prompt: a kid befriends a friendly tiger cub, pixar style
jungle.text: Behind the waterfall, {child_name} met a playful tiger cub, and they became the best of friends.

space.prompt: a kid is wearing an astronaut suit, pixar style
space.text: Far away, past the moon and the stars, {child_name} zoomed through the cosmos in a rocket that looked like candy.

space.prompt: a kid is walking on the moon with an indian flag on hand, pixar style
space.text: On a strange, new planet, {child_name} took a walk with a friendly robot who beeped and booped with joy.
